statements: SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT name, city FROM riders WHERE age > 25;
SELECT rider_id, name FROM riders WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM riders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, city FROM riders WHERE city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT * FROM riders WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT rider_id, name, city FROM riders WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_riders FROM riders GROUP BY gender;
SELECT name, age FROM riders WHERE city = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM riders;
SELECT * FROM riders WHERE rider_id = 1;
SELECT rider_name, rider_age FROM riders WHERE rider_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE ride_rating > 3;
SELECT rider_id, ride_date FROM rides WHERE ride_distance > 10.00;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM riders;
SELECT rider_name, rider_age FROM riders
SELECT * FROM riders WHERE rider_age > 25
SELECT rider_name, ride_date FROM riders, rides WHERE riders.rider_id = rides.rider_id
SELECT rider_name, ride_distance, ride_rating FROM riders INNER JOIN rides ON riders.rider_id = rides.rider_id
SELECT MAX(ride_distance) AS max_distance FROM rides
SELECT rider_id, age, gender, location FROM rider_demographics;
SELECT * FROM ride_history;
SELECT ride_id, rider_id, ride_date, distance, fare FROM ride_history ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_age_range FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender='Female';
SELECT rider_id, age, gender, location FROM rider_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM rider_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT rider_id, gender FROM rider_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY rider_id;
SELECT strategy_name, target_gender, target_age_range FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_age_range LIKE '%20s%' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT rd.rider_id, rd.age, rh.ride_date, rh.distance, rh.fare FROM rider_demographics rd INNER JOIN ride_history rh ON rd.rider_id = rh.rider_id WHERE rh.distance > 10 ORDER BY rh.distance DESC;

SELECT rh.ride_id, rd.age, rd.location, ms.strategy_name FROM ride_history rh INNER JOIN rider_demographics rd ON rh.rider_id = rd.rider_id INNER JOIN marketing_strategies ms ON rd.gender = ms.target_gender WHERE ms.strategy_name = 'Promo';
SELECT * FROM Riders ORDER BY age ASC, gender DESC
SELECT rider_id, age, location FROM Riders WHERE age > 25
SELECT * FROM Trips WHERE fare > 50 ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults'
SELECT rider_id, preferred_vehicle_type, preferred_route FROM Preferences WHERE rider_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Trips WHERE trip_date = '2021-07-15';
SELECT rider_id, trip_duration FROM Trips WHERE fare > 50 ORDER BY trip_duration DESC;
SELECT preference_id, preferred_vehicle_type, preferred_route FROM Preferences WHERE rider_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Riders WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, fare FROM Trips JOIN Riders ON Trips.rider_id = Riders.rider_id WHERE Riders.location = 'New York' ORDER BY fare DESC;
SELECT * FROM riders;
SELECT rider_id, age, gender FROM riders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT rider_id, income FROM riders WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM riders ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC;
SELECT rider_id, age, gender FROM riders WHERE gender='Female' AND income > 50000;
SELECT pref_id, preferred_location, preferred_ride_type FROM preferences WHERE rider_id IN (SELECT rider_id FROM riders WHERE age < 30);
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE cost BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT rider_id, AVG(income) AS avg_income FROM riders GROUP BY rider_id HAVING AVG(income) > 40000;
